input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

product title:
Poster Magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings 1892

Product features:
Attractive Poster Reprint of magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings
Printed at 16 x 24 in.
HIgh quality, non-glossy photo paper
1892

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This 1892 reprint of an Attractive Poster is a high quality, non-glossy photo print of a magician pulling roses out of a top hat surrounded by supernatural beings.  Measuring 16 x 24 inches, this poster is sure to be a conversation piece in any room.  The supernatural beings in this scene are thought to be fairies, known in the Victorian period to be protectors of the home and bringers of good fortune.  The magician, with his top hat brim full of roses, is an iconic symbol of sophistication and charm, and is sure to add a touch of magic to any room.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
